channel.title: Simple Life Cloud Log
channel.description: Recent content on Simple Life Cloud Log

item.title: [Diablo 4] Ancestral Unique Item [Tibault's Will] Info
item.description: [Ancestral Unique Pants] Tibault’s Will link 925 Item Power 925 Armor +[28 - 42] All Stats +[638 - 873] Maximum Life +[5 - 13] Maximum Resource [10.5 - 15.0]% Damage Reduction while Unstoppable Requires Level: 80 You deal [10 - 20]%[x] increased damage while Unstoppable and for 5 seconds after. When you become Unstoppable, gain 50 of your Primary Resource. “The younger apprentices think wearing heavy plate in the swamps is foolish.

item.title: [Diablo 4] Ancestral Mythic Unique Item [Harlequin Crest] Info
item.description: [Ancestral Mythic Unique Helm] Harlequin Crest link 925 Item Power 1,156 Armor +1,850 Maximum Life +18 Maximum Resource +2,500 Armor 20.0% Cooldown Reduction Requires Level: 35 Gain 20% Damage Reduciton. In addition, gain +4 Ranks to all Skills. This headdress was once worn by an assassin disguised as a court mage. Her treachery was unveiled, but not before she used its magic to curse the king’s entire lineage. - The Fall of House Aston Document Update History link Date Description 2024-08-17 document was created

item.title: [Diablo 4] Ancestral Unique Item [Mother's Embrace] Info
item.description: [Ancestral Unique Ring] Mother’s Embrace link 925 Item Power +10.0% Resistance to All Elements +10.0% Shadow Resistance +[47 - 65] All Stats +[10.5 - 15.0]% Attack Speed +[6.0 - 8.0]% Critical Strike Chance +[6.0 - 8.0]% Lucky Hit Chance Requires Level: 80 If a Core Skill hits 4 or more enemies, [30 - 60]% of the Resource cost is refunded. “Every tome, every scroll, every book in this temple produces the same answer.

item.title: [Diablo 4] Ancestral Unique Item [Gloves of The Illuminator] Info
item.description: [Ancestral Unique Gloves] Gloves of The Illuminator link 925 Item Power 462 Armor +[9.0 - 11.0]% Critical Strike Chance +[10.5 - 15.0]% Fireball Attack Speed (Sorcerer Only) +[1 - 2] Mana when a Fireball Explodes +[2 - 3]% to Fireball (Sorcerer Only) Requires Level: 80 Fireball now bounces as it travels, exploding each time it hits the ground, but its explosion deals [30 - 0]% less damage. (Sorcerer Only) After Inarius returned to Sanctuary, he sought a way back to the High Heavens.

item.title: [Diablo 4] Ancestral Unique Item [Staff of Endless Rage] Info
item.description: [Ancestral Unique Staff] Staff of Endless Rage link 925 Item Power 3,677 Damage Per Second [2,942 - 4,412] Damage per Hit 1.00 Attacks per Second +170% Fire Damage +[252 - 360] Intelligence +[37.0 - 55.0]% Fireball Projectile Speed +[57.0 - 75.0]% Chance for Fireball Projectiles to Cast Twice (Sorcerer Only) +[4 - 6] to Fireball (Sorcerer Only) Requires Level: 80 Every 3rd of Fireball launches 2 additional projectiles and deals [50 - 90]%[x] increased damage.

item.title: [Diablo 4] Ancestral Unique Item [Tal Rasha's Iridescent Loop] Info
item.description: [Ancestral Unique Ring] Tal Rasha’s Iridescent Loop link 925 Item Power +10.0% Resistance to All Elements +4.0% Resistance to All Elements +[6.0 - 8.0]% Lucky Hit Chance +[57.0 - 75.0]% Non-Physical Damage 12.0% Cooldown Reduction +[2 - 3] to Potent Warding (Sorcerer Only) Requires Level: 80 For each type of Elemental damage you deal, gain [10.0 - 20.0]%[x] incresed damage for 4 seconds, up to [40.0 - 80.0]%[x]. Dealing Elemental damage refreshes all bonuses.

item.title: [Diablo 4] Ancestral Unique Item [Fractured WinterGlass] Info
item.description: [Ancestral Unique Amulet] Fractured WinterGlass link 925 Item Power +25.0% Resistance to All Elements +[57.0 - 75.0]% Non-Physical Damage +[13.0 - 17.5]% Chance for Frozen Orb Projectiles to Cast Twice (Sorcerer Only) Conjuration Cooldowns are Reduced by +[0.1 - 0.3] Seconds when a Fronzen Orb Explodes +[3 - 4] to Conjuration Mastery (Sorcerer Only) Requires Level: 80 Casting Frozen Orb has a [35 - 65]% chance to spawn a random Conjuration when it explodes.

item.description: [Ancestral Unique Amulet] Locran’s Talisman link 925 Item Power +25.0% Resistance to All Elements +[2.0 - 3.0]% All Stats +[5 - 13] Maximum Resource +[88.0 - 115.0]% Critical Strike Damage +[8.0 - 10.0]% Resistance to All Elements Requires Level: 80 Your skills gain a [0.10 - 0.40]%[+] Critical Strike Chance bonus per point of Primary Resource you have, upto [10 - 40]%[+]. item.description: [Ancestral Unique Boots] Esu’s Heirloom link 925 Item Power 462 Armor Evade Grants +125% Movement Speed for 3 Second +[12.5 - 18.0]% Movement Speed +[8.0 - 12.5]% Movement Speed for 7 Seconds After Killing an Elite +[57.0 - 75.0]% Critical Strike Damage +[8.0 - 10.0]% Resistance to All Elements Requires Level: 80 Your Critical Strike Chance is increased by [20 - 40]% of your Movement Speed bonus. item.title: [Diablo 4] Ancestral Unique Item [Axial Conduit] Info
item.description: [Ancestral Unique Pants] Axial Conduit link 925 Item Power 925 Armor +[13.5 - 22.5]% Chance for Chain Lightning Projectiles to Cast Twice (Sorcerer Only) [10.5 - 15.0]% Damage Reduction [23.5 - 32.5]% Resource Generation and Maximum +[2 - 3] to Chain Lightning (Sorcerer) Requires Level: 79 Chain Lightning alternates between orbitin you and seeking up to 3 enemies. When it returns, it drains 6 Mana from you for each active Chain Lightning.
